com.example.android.funkytasks

Class PicturePagerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.view.PagerAdapter
      • com.example.android.funkytasks.PicturePagerAdapter

  • public class PicturePagerAdapter
extends android.support.v4.view.PagerAdapter
    An adapter that allows us to display photos, and scroll through photos on the same activity
